name: Stack Block -The Brain Hexa free fun Puzzle Games
name_original: Stack Block -The Brain Hexa free fun Puzzle Games
description:
Stack Block Puzzle Game is a three-dimensional puzzle-like casual game which plays very similar to the heap box, but the fewer points you use in the game, the higher your score will be.

The final renderings are shown in the top left corner of each level. The top 10 levels of the game are detailed, creative, and fun. Enjoy this addictive puzzle game that stacks color chips with a minimum number of steps win more stars!

Stack Block Puzzle Game is a very fun puzzle pass through the game. In the game, you should put all the squares on all the cubes on a cube above, is a test of intelligence of the game, come to have a try.

This newest game is challenging, exciting, and even infuriating at times. Like all great puzzles, Stack Block Puzzle will keep you entertained for just a moment, or will keep you engaged for hours of fun.

Easy rule but unlimited fun! Enjoy the world's most beloved puzzle game for FREE!
